content: this is my very first pattern so please let me know if you have any questions comments or problems thanks for those who are having trouble with outlining the petals- there s a great set of photos here http //olavas blogspot com/2009/08/oppskrift-pa-fargesterk-grytelapp html the page is in norweigan but the pictures are very good- i know my wording in the pattern leaves some scratching their heads **note on selling potholders** if you d like to sell potholders you make with this pattern please do i d like it if you included a link to the pattern and credit me as the designer
